title: Why Pyramid is awesome: the example of Facebook applications
summary: Beside the friends, walls and photos, Facebook is a platform where anybody can build applications or games taking advantage of the huge user base and connections between people.  Any web-capable language or framework can be used to do that, but this poster will show you why Pyramid is a most excellent choice.
